sections.Biography:
=== Background ===
Like [[Norren]], Thermund serves in the Northern army, and fought at theÂ [[Battle of the Whispering Wood]]. Thermund appears to be friends with Norren or at the very least known him before the events of the [[Red Wedding]] as he joked around with him about Norren claiming to had a large part in capture ofÂ [[Jaime Lannister]].

=== "[[Iron From Ice]]" ===
Thermund is seen outside [[The Twins]] with the other [[House Forrester]] warriors drinking alcohol and having fun during the Wedding. Thermund begins to questions Norren's story about him having a hand in capturing Jaime Lannister and playfully makes fun of him.
[[File:Thermund arrow.png|left|thumb|227x227px|Thermund killed with an arrow.]]

When the Red Wedding slaughter begins Thermund is one of the first House Forrester warriors to killed, Thermund is killed with an arrow through the neck by an unnamed Frey soldier.
